body: Knowing the artist I think the ending will be smooth, but who knows when his taste changes

I would be surprised if the husband isn't a cuck he looks and sounds like one. I took an instant dislike to him so was fine with the ntr, but the gang bang sharing spoiled any hope i had for this. I'm guessing husband will support her because sex isn't something he can provide and just wants her to be happy. I hope i am wrong, but we all know how these ntr stories play out by now.

Based on Kuzukago's past works, they're definitely more nuanced in their NTR works, so I hope to see interesting developments with this undercover photographer. Wife always made it a thing to point out her husband's flaws and him not knowing anything about the affair so this may be the turning point on that and let's hope his response to it will be something interesting. The only thing that bothers me is her obsession with Tanaka thinking that they have something special when it appears that it's nothing more than the current fling for like the other lady said.  I want to like her and enjoy the art, but she turns me off with her idea of what the relationship is with Tanaka and comes off as annoying She comes off as super naive and unlikeable with her reactions, but I hope that this builds up to what Kuzukago is aiming for with the story and maybe seeing some twists made on her by both Tanaka and her husband will make her reactions that much more priceless.
